command.text: select "Subsidiary_Accounts"."SubsAccountsID" "SubsAccountsID" ,"Subsidiary_Accounts"."AccFundID" "AccFundID" ,"AccFund"."AccFundName" "AccFundAccFundName" ,"Subsidiary_Accounts"."CoaDetailID" "CoaDetailID" ,"CoaDetail"."AccName" "CoaDetailAccName" ,"CoaDetailAccBalType"."AccBalType" "CoaDetailAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"CoaDetailAccCurrency"."AccCurrencyName" "CoaDetailAccCurrencyAccCurrencyName" ,"CoaDetailAccDest"."AccDest" "CoaDetailAccDestAccDest" ,"CoaDetailAccDestCompanyType"."Description" "CoaDetailAccDestCompanyTypeDescription" ,"CoaDetailAccFund"."AccFundName" "CoaDetailAccFundAccFundName" ,"CoaDetailAccSubType"."AccSubType" "CoaDetailAccSubTypeAccSubType" ,"CoaDetailAccType"."AccType" "CoaDetailAccTypeAccType" ,"CoaDetailCoaControl"."AccName" "CoaDetailCoaControlAccName" ,"CoaDetailCoaControlAccBalType"."AccBalType" "CoaDetailCoaControlAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"CoaDetailCoaControlAccDest"."AccDest" "CoaDetailCoaControlAccDestAccDest" ,"CoaDetailCoaControlAccType"."AccType" "CoaDetailCoaControlAccTypeAccType" ,"CoaDetailCoaControlCompType"."Description" "CoaDetailCoaControlCompTypeDescription" ,"CoaDetailCoaMain"."AccName" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccName" ,"CoaDetailCoaMainAccBalType"."AccBalType" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"CoaDetailCoaMainAccDest"."AccDest" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccDestAccDest" ,"CoaDetailCoaMainAccFund"."AccFundName" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccFundAccFundName" ,"CoaDetailCoaMainAccType"."AccType" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccTypeAccType" ,"CoaDetailCoaMainCoaControl"."AccName" "CoaDetailCoaMainCoaControlAccName" ,"CoaDetailCoaSub"."AccName" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccName" ,"CoaDetailCoaSubAccBalType"."AccBalType" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"CoaDetailCoaSubAccDest"."AccDest" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccDestAccDest" ,"CoaDetailCoaSubAccFund"."AccFundName" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccFundAccFundName" ,"CoaDetailCoaSubAccType"."AccType" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccTypeAccType" ,"CoaDetailCoaSubCoaControl"."AccName" "CoaDetailCoaSubCoaControlAccName" ,"CoaDetailCoaSubCoaMain"."AccName" "CoaDetailCoaSubCoaMainAccName" ,"Subsidiary_Accounts"."AccSubTypeID" "AccSubTypeID" ,"AccSubType"."AccSubType" "AccSubTypeAccSubType" ,"Subsidiary_Accounts"."AccSubCode" "AccSubCode" ,"AccSub"."AccSubName" "AccSubAccSubName" ,"AccSubAccSubType"."AccSubType" "AccSubAccSubTypeAccSubType" ,"Subsidiary_Accounts"."OpenDate" "OpenDate" ,"Subsidiary_Accounts"."OpenDebit" "OpenDebit" ,"Subsidiary_Accounts"."OpenCredit" "OpenCredit" ,"Subsidiary_Accounts"."AccCurrency" "AccCurrency" ,"AccCurrency"."AccCurrencyName" "AccCurrencyAccCurrencyName" ,"Subsidiary_Accounts"."AccCurrencyRate" "AccCurrencyRate" ,"Subsidiary_Accounts"."LastUpdateBy" "LastUpdateBy" ,"Subsidiary_Accounts"."LastUpdate" "LastUpdate" ,"Subsidiary_Accounts"."Dlt" "Dlt" ,"Subsidiary_Accounts"."AccBranchCode" "AccBranchCode" from "dbo"."Subsidiary_Accounts" "Subsidiary_Accounts" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "AccFund" on "Subsidiary_Accounts"."AccFundID" = "AccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."CoaDetail" "CoaDetail" on "Subsidiary_Accounts"."CoaDetailID" = "CoaDetail"."CoaDetailID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "CoaDetailAccBalType" on "CoaDetail"."AccBalTypeID" = "CoaDetailAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccCurrencys" "CoaDetailAccCurrency" on "CoaDetail"."AccCurrency" = "CoaDetailAccCurrency"."AccCurrencyID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "CoaDetailAccDest" on "CoaDetail"."AccDestID" = "CoaDetailAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."CompanyTypes" "CoaDetailAccDestCompanyType" on "CoaDetailAccDest"."CompanyType" = "CoaDetailAccDestCompanyType"."CompTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "CoaDetailAccFund" on "CoaDetail"."AccFundID" = "CoaDetailAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccSubTypes" "CoaDetailAccSubType" on "CoaDetail"."AccSubTypeID" = "CoaDetailAccSubType"."AccSubTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "CoaDetailAccType" on "CoaDetail"."AccTypeID" = "CoaDetailAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "CoaDetailCoaControl" on "CoaDetail"."CoaControlID" = "CoaDetailCoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "CoaDetailCoaControlAccBalType" on "CoaDetailCoaControl"."AccBalTypeID" = "CoaDetailCoaControlAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "CoaDetailCoaControlAccDest" on "CoaDetailCoaControl"."AccDestID" = "CoaDetailCoaControlAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "CoaDetailCoaControlAccType" on "CoaDetailCoaControl"."AccTypeID" = "CoaDetailCoaControlAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CompanyTypes" "CoaDetailCoaControlCompType" on "CoaDetailCoaControl"."CompType" = "CoaDetailCoaControlCompType"."CompTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaMain" "CoaDetailCoaMain" on "CoaDetail"."CoaMainID" = "CoaDetailCoaMain"."CoaMainID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccBalType" on "CoaDetailCoaMain"."AccBalTypeID" = "CoaDetailCoaMainAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccDest" on "CoaDetailCoaMain"."AccDestID" = "CoaDetailCoaMainAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccFund" on "CoaDetailCoaMain"."AccFundID" = "CoaDetailCoaMainAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccType" on "CoaDetailCoaMain"."AccTypeID" = "CoaDetailCoaMainAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "CoaDetailCoaMainCoaControl" on "CoaDetailCoaMain"."CoaControlID" = "CoaDetailCoaMainCoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."CoaSub" "CoaDetailCoaSub" on "CoaDetail"."CoaSubID" = "CoaDetailCoaSub"."CoaSubID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccBalType" on "CoaDetailCoaSub"."AccBalTypeID" = "CoaDetailCoaSubAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccDest" on "CoaDetailCoaSub"."AccDestID" = "CoaDetailCoaSubAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccFund" on "CoaDetailCoaSub"."AccFundID" = "CoaDetailCoaSubAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccType" on "CoaDetailCoaSub"."AccTypeID" = "CoaDetailCoaSubAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "CoaDetailCoaSubCoaControl" on "CoaDetailCoaSub"."CoaControlID" = "CoaDetailCoaSubCoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."CoaMain" "CoaDetailCoaSubCoaMain" on "CoaDetailCoaSub"."CoaMainID" = "CoaDetailCoaSubCoaMain"."CoaMainID" left join "dbo"."AccSubTypes" "AccSubType" on "Subsidiary_Accounts"."AccSubTypeID" = "AccSubType"."AccSubTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccSubNames" "AccSub" on "Subsidiary_Accounts"."AccSubCode" = "AccSub"."AccSubCode" left join "dbo"."AccSubTypes" "AccSubAccSubType" on "AccSub"."AccSubTypeID" = "AccSubAccSubType"."AccSubTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccCurrencys" "AccCurrency" on "Subsidiary_Accounts"."AccCurrency" = "AccCurrency"."AccCurrencyID"
